title: Chris Cabott, CEO of Steinberg Sports & Entertainment
itunes:title: Chris Cabott, CEO of Steinberg Sports & Entertainment
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch as they speak with CEO of Steinberg Sports & Entertainment, Chris Cabott, about his role as CEO and how he was involved in negotiating Patrick Mahomes' contract extension leading to the largest deal in sports history. All that and more on Business of Sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
